price: 138. Kanu (Qur’aanku) waa hadal u cad dadka, waana u hanuun iyo waano kuwa Alle ka cabsada (ee iska jira Ciqaabkiisa).
arabic: هَٰذَا بَيَانٞ لِّلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hādhā bayānun lilnnāsi wahudan wamawʿiẓatun lil'muttaqīna
